MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the EH38 postcode area of Heriot, affecting properties in Heriot Way and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6.38pm. Our engineers have arrived on site at the Heriot Village substation and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9.45pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7.30pm on Tuesday 19th January 2021.
